column4: my usb slots wont auto detect, they only detect what is plugged in when i boot.  anyone know how to fix this?
my usb slots wont auto detect, they only detect what is plugged in when i boot.  anyone know how to fix this?
i'm not sure about your system, but I have to turn that function on in my BIOS.
i guess that would be step one.  :)  after that I'm not sure how to help.
